mapper.select: select * from zd_rent_installment_detail where setting_id = #{settingId} order by num asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zd_rent_installment_detail( setting_id, num, foregift_money, packet_money, insurance_money, money, expire_time ) VALUES ( #{settingId}, #{num}, #{foregiftMoney}, #{packetMoney}, #{insuranceMoney}, #{money}, #{expireTime} )
mapper.delete: delete from zd_rent_installment_detail where setting_id = #{settingId} and num = #{num}
